name: Night Heist (Ericbomb)
description:
An audio game where you are on a quest to cheat a crew out of their own ship.

Team up with your hacker, suit up, and close your eyes as you head into a Dusk Ship. Where the only way to stay undetected is to make it so you don't see a thing while inside.

 Using audio queues, memorizing routes, and listening carefully you need to get through every level while capturing robots that have keys, avoiding security bots, and of course avoiding the Doomba!

But if you get lost, don't worry. You have a hacker on your side, so you can always cheat!
